abstract: Stripe announces that it has raised funding in its latest round of investment that puts value of start-up at $5 billion, jump from previous round in which it received $70 billion at $3.5 billion valuation.
lead_paragraph: The San Francisco-based digital payments start-up now has a $5 billion valuation and a partnership with Visa to help it compete.

headline.main: Stripe, Digital Payments Start-Up, Raises New Funding and Partners With Visa
headline.print_headline: Stripe Raises New Funding and Partners With Visa

snippet: The San Francisco-based digital payments start-up now has a $5 billion valuation and a partnership with Visa to help it compete.
